322796.「うむ。よく来てくれた。\n そなたたちが グランゼニス神の復活に向けて\n 動:
Good, you're here. I heard that you're making
headway in the resurrection of Gran Zenith.

322797.「話というのは 他でもない。\n エテーネ王国の式典から 帰ってきて以来\n 眠:
And this is about none other than Anlucia,
I surmise. She's been asleep ever since the
ceremony in the Ethene Kingdom.

322798.「アンルシアは グランゼニス神の器。\n この異常な眠りは かの神と\n 大きく:
She is the vessel of Gran Zenith.
Her abnormal slumber must be related
to him somehow.

322799.「ゆえに アンルシアの目覚めこそが\n グランゼニス神復活のカギとなるのではない:
That is why...I believe that awakening Anlucia
will be the key to Gran Zenith's resurrection.

322800.「あるいは 神の復活が果たされなければ\n 器も目覚めない という可能性もある。:
Or is it that the vessel will remain asleep
until the god is resurrected? Whatever
the case may be, it's all just speculation...

322801.「……叡智の冠の賢者よ。迷うことはない。\n 何か 手がかりがあるなら この者に:
Sage of the Crown of Wisdom... You musn'nt
show any hesitation. If you have any ideas at
all, please share them with <if_woman>her<else>him<endif>.

322803.「我のことは どうでもよい。\n 勇者の目覚めと 神の復活は 表裏一体。:
Don't worry about who I am. The Hero's
awakening and Gran Zenith's resurrection
are two sides of the same coin.

322804.「ならば その両者と関わりのある この者こそ\n もっとも 答えに近い場所に い:
Then it's only logical that <if_woman>she<else>he<endif> is closest to
finding the answer, having a connection with them
both and all. Don't you agree?

322805.「あれ……<pc>隊長？\n ここ どこ？ このおねーさん 誰？:
Huh...? <pc>...? Where am I?
Who's this woman?

322806.「私は このグランゼドーラ王国に仕える\n 賢者 ルシェンダだ。\n そなたは…:
I am Lushenda, a sage in the service of this
kingdom of Gran Zedora. And you are...?

322807.「あたしは ポルテ！\n 賢者の ええっと……ルシェンダさま！\n はじめまして:
I'm Porte! Sage, uh...Lushenda!
Pleasure to meet you!

322808.「ふむ……。そなたが\n 報告にあった ポルテという少女か。\n そなたの助言に:
Hmm... So you're that Porte girl from the
report. I will heed your advice.

322809.「アンルシアの目覚めについて\n 何か知っている者がいるとすれば\n それは シ:
If there's anyone who knows anything about
Anlucia's awakening, Shion would.

322810.「シオン殿は現在 行方知れずとなっているが\n 先日 彼の部屋で 手に入れたもの:
He is currently absent, but I found something
in his room just the other day. It was this
feather.

322811.「わあっ。キレイな羽根だね。\n シオンって人の持ち物なの？:
Wow, what a pretty feather!
And they're from this Shion?

322812.「これが手がかりとなるか わからんが\n シオン殿を捜しだし アンルシアを\n:
I'm not sure how it will help exactly, but
I hope that you can find Shion and
awaken Anlucia.

322814.「どうにかして あたしたちは\n その人を捜さないと いけないんだよね？\n う:
We gotta find him somehow, right?
Hmm... But how...

322815.「ねえねえ <pc>隊長。\n もしかして ラキなら この羽根のニオイを\n た:
Hey, <pc>! Maybe Lycae can track
the smell from this feather!

322816.「狼になれるんだし 鼻が利きそうでしょ？\n エテーネの村へ戻って ラキに頼んで:
He can turn into a wolf, so he's probably got
a strong nose, right? C'mon, let's head to
Ethene Village and ask him to help!

322817.「方法は まかせる。\n シオン殿が姿を消したことにも 理由があろう。\n 頼ん:
I'll leave it to you, then. There must be
some reason for Shion's disappearance.
Don't let us down, <pc>.

322818.<pc>は やぐらの中に入り\n地下に降りて 奥の部屋へと 向かっていった。:
<pc> makes their way inside the
fort, heading down into the chamber
below.

322819.「うわぁ～！ 白いお馬のぬいぐるみ？\n ゆる～い感じが なんか かわいいね！:
Wow! A white horse plushie?
I love how dopey it looksーit's so cute!

322820.「よく 見つけてくれましたね <pc>。\n おひさしぶりです シオンです。:
I'm surprised you found me, <pc>.
It's been quite some time. It's me, Shion.

322822.「行きちがいになった時の 連絡手段として\n 白き導き手を そこに 残しておきま:
As a way to stay in contact in case we missed
one another, I left the Handy Horse there.
It appears to have come in handy.

322823.「お手数ですが 今から\n 光の神殿へ 来ていただけませんか？\n 私も すぐに:
Could you please head to the Temple of Light
right away? I am on my way there as we
speak.

322824.「グランゼニス神の復活。アンルシアの目覚め。\n それらに関わる 重要な話をした:
I would like to discuss important matters
concerning Gran Zenith's revival and Anlucia's
awakening. I will see you there!

322826.「念のため 聞くけど そのぬいぐるみが\n シオンって人じゃないよね？:
Just to be clear... That plushie isn't Shion,
is it?

322827.「羽根のニオイは\n その白いのから してたみたい。:
The feather's smell is coming from that
white thing.

322828.「シオンさん？……の 言ってたとおり\n 光の神殿ってとこへ行けば\n 本人に:
Shion, right...? Is what he said true?
Will we be able to meet him in person if
we go to the Temple of Light?

322829.「ラキも行く！\n グランゼニス神の復活……\n その話 ラキも聞きたい！:
Lycae is coming too!
If it's about Gran Zenith's revival, he
wants to know all about it!

322830.「よ～し。それじゃ\n シオンさんに会いに みんなで\n 光の神殿へ ゴーゴー！:
Alrighty, then! Let's go to the Temple of
Light to meet with Shion!

322831.「ここが 光の神殿……？\n なんだか 静かすぎて 落ち着かないとこだね。:
So this is the Temple of Light...?
It's so quiet, it's making me feel anxious...

322832.「シオンは どこ？\n 誰の気配も 感じない……。:
Where is Shion? Lycae can't sense anyone's
presence here...

322834.「よく来てくれました <pc>。\n こうして会うのは 本当に ひさしぶりです。:
I'm glad you've come, <pc>.
It really has been ages since we last met like
this. Are these two new companions of yours?

322835.「わぁ あなたが シオくんだねっ。\n お馬さんになれるなんて すっご～い！:
Wow! You must be Shion!
It's so amazing that you can turn into
a horse!

322836.「なるほど……。\n おおいに 興味はそそられますが\n 時間が惜しいので 今は:
I see... I am quite intrigued, but time is of
the essence here. Let's proceed with the
discussion.

322837.「私は これまで 復活の時にそなえて\n 地上のどこかから わずかに感じられる\:
I have been following Gran Zenith's faint
presence from somewhere on the surface,
all in preparation for His revival.

322838.「そして 創失と呼ばれる現象が起こった時\n それに呼応するかのように 光の神殿:
And when this phenomenon called "unmaking" occurred, His presence began emanating from this temple quite stronglyーalmost as if He
was reacting to it.

322839.「ですが それはすぐに 途切れてしまいました。\n 復活を果たすのに グランゼニ:
However, that presence soon faded. It seems
that Gran Zenith's current power is
insufficient for His revival.

322840.「<pc>。あなたは\n 神の緋石のことを 覚えていますか？: You remember the Divine Crimsonite, yes?

322841.「グランゼニス神の血より生まれた 守りの石。\n 全部で ４つの緋石が アストル:
A protective stone, born from Gran Zenith's
own blood. In all, there were four of them
that were worshipped throughout Astoltia.

322842.「大魔王マデサゴーラの腹心\n 魔元帥ゼルドラドの 策略によって\n ひとつが:
One remains shattered by the machinations of
Madesagora's chief marshal, Zeldrad.

322843.「おそらくは それが チカラが足りない原因。\n 主が復活を果たすには 砕かれた:
Perhaps that is the reason for His lack of
power. For His revival to happen, that Divine
Crimsonite must be repaired.

322844.「そのためには 無事に残った３つの緋石の\n チカラを集める必要があり それをあ:
To do so, I'll need you to gather the power of
the three Crimsonites that remain intact.
That is why I had called you here.

322846.<pc>は シオンから\n緋色の宝石（だいじなもの）を 受け取った。<me 60:
<pc> received the Crimson Jewel
(Key Item) from Shion.<me 60>

322847.「その宝石を持って モンセロ温泉峡の奥に向かい\n ご神体の間に まつられた 神:
With that jewel in hand, head to the Hall of
Worship deep within the Moncello Spring
Gorge to gather the Crimsonite's energy.

322848.「勇者の盟友たる あなたであれば\n それを手にし 強く願うだけで\n 事が 成:
As the Hero's ally, you should be able to do
so if you desire it strongly enough.

322849.「モンセロ温泉峡以外の場所は\n この私が 向かいますので ご心配なく。:
I will head to the other locations myself, so
you needn't worry about them.

322850.「グランゼニス神の復活が果たされれば\n その加護を受けた勇者も 目覚める……。:
When Gran Zenith is revived, the Hero who
has received His blessing shall also awaken...
I am sure of it.

322851.「では 私は これにて。: With that, I shall take my leave.

322852.「シオくん 行っちゃった……。\n 聞きたいこと いろいろ あったのになあ。\n:
And Shio's gone...and I had so many questions
I wanted to ask him, too... Like, "Are carrots
your favorite food?"...

322853.「……それより やるべきことを やらないと。\n すぐに モンセロ温泉峡に 行こ:
But we've more important matters.
Let's go to Moncello Spring Gorge right
away!

322854.「あっ。あそこにあるのが 神の緋石かな？: Oh! Is that the Divine Crimsonite?

322855.「こいつ 邪魔する気か……。\n <cs_pchero> 戦おう！:
That monster is trying to stop us...
<cs_pchero>! Come on!

322856.「なんなの あの魔物！！\n ラキが 助けてくれなかったら\n ペシャンコになっ:
What was with that monster?!
If Lycae hadn't saved me, I'd be as flat
as a pancake right now!

322857.「あの魔物のニオイ……\n 前に どこかで 嗅いだような……。:
That monster's smell...
It smells familiar...but from where?

322858.「でも この辺りは 腐った卵みたいな\n ニオイが きつくて はっきりしない……:
But there's a strong rotten egg smell in this
place, so it's difficult to tell...

322859.「う～ん。気にはなるけど 今は\n 緋石のチカラをもらうのが 先かな。\n <c:
Hmmm... I am curious, but I think we should
focus on the Crimsonite first. I'll leave that
to you!

322860.<cs_pchero>の意思が伝わり\n緋色の宝石が 神の緋石のチカラで\n満た:
<cs_pchero>'s resolve is conveyed,
filling the Crimson Jewel with the power
of the Divine Crimsonite!

322861.「<cs_pchero> ご苦労様です。\n 神の緋石が 宝石に反応したのを感じ:
Thank you for your help. I sensed that the
Crimsonite reacted to the jewel without
incident.

322862.「無事じゃないよ シオくん！\n よく わかんない魔物に 襲われたんだよっ。:
But there WAS an incident, Shio! Some monster
tried attacking me!

322863.「なんと……。それは 予想していませんでした。\n 危険な目にあわせてしまい 申:
What...? I was not expecting that. My apologies for putting you in harm's way. If there are those who wish to disrupt us,
then we must be even quicker...

322865.「さて。こちらのほうも ピラミッドと\n ダーマ神殿の緋石のチカラを 得られまし:
In any case...I've gathered the power of the Crimsonites in the Pyramid and Alltrades Abbey. All that remains it to repair the
Crimsonite that's broken.

322866.「そうすれば グランゼニス神のチカラも高まり\n 復活が なされるはずです。:
Then Gran Zenith will regain His power, and
can finally revive.

322867.「緋石のある古き神の遺跡は ソーラリア峡谷ごと\n 大魔王の生みだした ねじれた:
The last Crimsonite was in the Historic Ruins. It was supposed to disappear when the whole of Solaria Canyon was overwritten by
Madesagora's Twisted Deformed Earth...

322868.「女神ルティアナの加護ゆえか 今も\n 偽りの世界に 存在を残しているのです。\:
Perhaps, because of Lutiana's blessing, it
still may have a presence in the false world.
Madesagora likely did not expect that.

322869.「おかげで 神の緋石を再生できるというもの。\n 偽りのレンダーシア ソーラリア:
You can find it by going deep within the
Historic Ruins of the Solaria Canyon within
the false Lendersia.

322872.「この紳士の お仲間の方ですか。\n 今まさに 処刑を執行しようというところに\:
Are you companions of this gentleman?
You've interrupted me just as I was about
to carry out my execution.

322873.「無論 あなた方も 同罪です。\n 神の緋石を 再生させようなどという愚行は\n:
Of course, you are just as guilty as he.
Your folly in trying to restore the Divine
Crimsonite will not be allowed.

322874.「わたくしめは 執行者ガンガブラと申す者。\n 我が主の命により あなた方を処刑:
I am Gangabra, executioner extraordinaire.
I've come here to kill you by orders of my
master.

322875.「こいつ……\n 温泉で戦った魔物と 同じニオイ！:
He... He has the same smell as the monster
from the hot springs!

322876.「このニオイ……さっきは わからなかったけど\n とうさまに まとわりついていた:
This smell... Lycae didn't realize it before,
but it's the same smell as the curse of
unmaking that clung to Father!

322877.「えっ。どういうこと？\n 創失の呪いは 消え去ったんじゃないの？:
Huh? What do you mean?
Isn't the curse of unmaking supposed to be
gone?

322878.「わからない……。\n けれど こいつは すごく危険。:
Lycae doesn't know...
But he is really dangerous!

322879.「ラキと <cs_pchero>が 相手をする。\n ポルテは 下がってて！:
Lycae and <cs_pchero> will take care of this.
Stay back, Porte!

322880.「抵抗するのですね。\n ただ 苦しみが増えるだけなのに\n 愚かとしか 言いよ:
So you mean to resist me? How foolish.
You only worsen your suffering.

322881.「しかし それを望むのならば\n こちらも お応えいたしましょう。\n いざ！！:
But if that is what you desire, then I will
be happy to oblige!
Come at me!!

322882.「これは 申し訳ありません。\n わたくしめは あなた方のことを\n すこしばか:
My apologies. It seems that I've
underestimated your abilities.

322883.「今回は いったん 退きましょう。\n 神の緋石が 再生されてしまうのは\n 業:
I'll withdraw for now. It's frustrating that
you'll be able to restore your Divine
Crimsonite, but there's just no other option.

322884.「おまえは なんだ？\n どうして 創失の呪いと 同じニオイがする！？:
Just what are you?
Why do you have the same scent as the
curse of unmaking?!

322885.「その問いに 答える必要を 認めません。: I see no need to answer that question.

322886.「罪人は ただ いずれ執行される\n 刑の恐怖に 震えていればいいのです。\n:
Criminals need only tremble in fear of the
punishment they inevitably face!
Ahahaha!

322888.「<cs_pchero> すみません。\n 緋石再生の準備に 集中していたせいで:
I'm sorry, <cs_pchero>. I was so focused
on preparing to restore the Crimsonite
that I let my guard down.

322889.「キズのほうは 大したことは ありません。\n どうか ご心配なく。: Don't worry. My wounds are nothing serious.

322890.「ラキは…… だいじょうぶかな？: Lycae... Is he going to be okay?

322891.「彼の安否は 気になりますが\n 後を追う手段が なくては どうにも……。\n:
His safety is concerning, but unfortunately without a means to go after him, there's nothing we can do... For now, let's try
restoring the Crimsonite.

322892.「緋色の宝石に宿したチカラを使い\n 砕かれた緋石の再生を 試みます。\n あな:
I will attempt to restore the shattered
Crimsonite with the power contained in
the Crimson Jewel. Please assist me.

322893.「大いなる神の遺せし 加護の緋石よ。\n そのチカラを 今ここに 呼び起こさん。:
O blessed Divine Crimsonite, bequeathed by
our great god... I call your power here.
Respond to our resolve!

322894.「ふう……。再生は 成功しました。\n これで グランゼニス神のチカラが高まり\:
Phew... The restoration was successful. With
this, I believe that Gran Zenith's power will
return, and encourage His revival.

322895.「ラキも それを望んでたもんね。\n まごゼニスさまが 復活すれば\n あの 執:
That's what Lycae hoped for, too.
If Other-Zenith comes back to life, even
that executioner guy can't threaten us!

322896.「これは……！\n グランゼニス神の強い気配を 感じます。:
Is this...? I feel Gran Zenith's presence
quite strongly!

322897.「ですが 光の神殿からではない。\n グランゼドーラ城の……\n アンルシアの部:
But not from the Temple of Light.
From Gran Zedora Castle...near Anlucia's
room...?

322898.「アンルシアの部屋へ 向かいます。\n あなたも すぐに 来てください。\n 状:
I'm headed to Anlucia's room now.
Please meet me there immediately. We
have to see what's happened!

322899.「アンルシアは まだ 眠っているようです。: Anlucia is still asleep, it seems.

322901.「……じつに 久方ぶりだな。\n 我が眷属 天馬ファルシオンよ。\n 息災なよう:
...It's been quite awhile. Pegasus
Falchion, my servant... Glad to see
that you're well.

322902.「なんだか ずいぶんと かたくるしい\n しゃべり方の お姫さまなんだね。\n:
You speak pretty casually, for a
princess... You're way different than the
image I had of you in my head...

322903.「その懐かしき気配は……。\n まさか そんなことが……！？:
This nostalgic feeling...
C-can it be...?!

322904.「いかにも。我が名は グランゼニス。: Indeed. My name is Gran Zenith.

322905.「これは いったん\n 状況を整理する必要が ありそうですね……。:
I think we need to take a moment to sort out
this situation...

322906.「……神の緋石によって 高まったチカラが\n あなたの復活を うながしたものの\:
The power gathered by the Divine Crimsonites
did prompt your revival, but for some reason,
only your spirit was resurrected.

322907.「創失の呪いに侵されるのを 防ぐため\n あなたの加護によって 眠りつづけていた:
And you entered Anlucia's body, who slept with
your blessing to prevent the curse of unmaking
from reaching her...is that right?

322908.「うむ。本来 身体と精神の復活は\n 同時に 果たされるはずであったのだ。:
Yes. Both the revival of my body and spirit
were to happen at the same time.

322909.「この まごゼニスさまを\n ゼニアスに 連れていっても きっと\n ネーしゃま:
Even if we take Other-Zenith to Zeniath, I'm
sure Zenny would say it's a no-go.

322910.「完全なる神の復活とは 言えないでしょう。\n アンルシアのためにも 早急に\n:
It may not be a complete revival, but for
Anlucia's sake, He must be revived
fully, and soon.

322911.「私が 女神ルティアナより 賜った神器……。\n 断罪の剣は 今 どうなっている:
That divine artifact that Lutiana gave me,
the Sword of Atonement...what of it now?

322912.「グランゼニス様が ご兄姉のチカラを借りて\n ナドラガ神との戦いで 振るった剣:
That is the sword that you brandished in
battle against Nadraga, with the help of your
siblings.

322913.「この目で 見たい。\n 我が身体の復活には あの剣が必要だ。:
I want to see for myself.
I need that sword to restore my body.

322914.「なるほど……。断罪の剣のチカラまで\n 必要になるとは 思いも寄りませんでした:
I see... I had no idea that you would require
the sword's power after all. I am truly sorry.

322915.「おまえは 勇者の片割れのようだな。\n この状態では 私の神としてのチカラにも:
You look to be the Hero's other half.
Looks like my divine power is pretty limited
right now. You'll come with me, right?

322916.「<pc>。私からも お願いします。\n 断罪の剣は 竜族の世界 ナドラガンドの:
I ask this of you as well. The Sword of
Atonement is pierced within the land of
the Nadragram Shrine.

322917.「もちろん あたしも ついていくよ。\n まごゼニスさまを 完全復活させれば\n:
Of course we'll go with you! If we can revive
you all the way, then the Princess can go
back to normal, right?

322920.「グランゼニス様の御身は 光の神殿にあります。\n 私は そちらで 準備を進めま:
Gran Zenith's body lies in the Temple of
Light, so I will make preparations there.
Please excuse me.

323048.「一度 聖都エジャルナの大神殿に戻るとしよう。\n ポルテを早く 休ませてやりた:
I'm going back to the Grand Temple in Holy
City Ejarna to give Porte a rest.

323049.気を失ったポルテを抱えて\n休ませてあげられそうな場所を 探していると\n竜族の:
While I was looking for a place where I could
rest with the unconscious Porte in my arms, a
Nadravian female priestess called out to me.

323051.「どうか ご心配なく。\n 見たところ ケガなどはありませんし\n 過労のような:
Please don't worry. From what I can see, there
are no injuries, and I don't think it's
something like overwork.

323052.「助かった。ポルテのことを頼めるか？\n 我々は 協団の指導者に 闇の領界のこと:
Thank God, can you help me with Porte? We have
to go tell the leaders of the cooperative
about the Dark Realm.

323053.「待て <pc>……。\n ふたりきりで 話したいことがある。\n ここに 残っ:
Wait <pc>... I want to talk to you
alone. Could you stay here?

323055.「我が 何者なのか……。\n そなたも おおいに 気になっていよう。: Who am I? You must be wondering a lot.

323056.「我に残された時間は 少ない。\n 今のうちに 伝えておくべきかと思うてな。:
My time is short. I thought I should tell you
while I still can.

323057.「女神ルティアナの創りし世界 アストルティア。\n 創生のチカラをもって生まれし:
Astoltia, the world created by the Goddess Lutiana, where all things are born with the power of creation, and where life and
sometimes even will dwell...

323058.「我は アストルティアの大地そのもの……\n その意思が具現化した存在と 理解す:
You may understand that I am the land of
Astoltia itself, the embodiment of its will.

323059.「この世界に 降りかかった 創失の呪いを\n 自ら 振り払うため アストルティア:
In order to shake off the curse of unmaking that has befallen this world, Astoltia's will has taken on the form of a freely moving human
being.

323060.「しかし この姿となった我は\n 長く 活動することが かなわなかった。\n す:
But in this form, I could not be active for
long. Because my body was already under a
curse.

323061.「そこで 我は 創失の影響を受けていない部分を\n 切り離して 新たな人格と成さ:
So I detached the parts that were not affected by unmaking and made them into a new personality. That is the girl you know so
well, Porte.

323062.「あの娘と我は 同時に顕現することはできぬが\n 心の内の世界でなら 話すことは:
She and I cannot manifest at the same time,
but we can talk in the inner world of our
minds.

323063.「人としての 知識や常識を教えているうちに\n 我のことを 師匠と\n 認識して:
I think you have come to recognize me as your
master as I teach you human knowledge and
common sense.

323064.「……我が そなたと出会ったのは\n エテーネ王国の お披露目式のときであったか:
I met you at the unveiling ceremony of the Old
Ethene Kingdom, when the curse of unmaking was
manifested.

323065.「幾人かが 存在そのものを消されたが\n 周りの者は 誰も それを認識できずにい:
Some were erased from existence, but no one
around them could recognize them. Except for
one of you.

323066.「そなたは 幾度も 神のチカラに触れたことで\n 自覚の無いまま 創生のチカラの:
You must have been exposed to the power of God so many times that you were able to perceive the transformation of the power of creation
without being aware of it.

323067.「ゆえに そなたに 磁光石を託した。\n あの娘とともに 創失の呪いを\n 根本:
Therefore, I entrusted Magnetolite to you. I entrusted Magnetolite to you so that together with her, you may break the curse of unmaking
at its root.

323068.「しかし 先ほどの怨念を 封印するため\n 想定外に 大きなチカラを使ってしまっ:
However, I have used a great deal of
unexpected power to seal up the grudge I just
had. I need to rest for the time being.

323070.「お話が 終わった頃かと思いまして。\n あらあら？ 眠ってしまわれたんですね。:
I thought we were just finishing up. Oh, no?
You fell asleep, didn't you?

323071.「ポルテさんのことは ご安心ください。\n 私が 看ていますので。:
Don't worry about Porte-san. I am taking care
of her.

323072.「トビアス様に ご用があるのでしょう？\n ２階の総主教の部屋に いると思います:
I believe you can find him upstairs in the
Patriarch's Room.

323073.「<pc>殿 お疲れ様でした。\n グランゼニス神より 話は聞いています。:
<pc> Good work, I have heard from
Gran Zenith.

323074.「謎の魔物たちの正体は 竜族の怨念……。\n そして 闇の領界に あふれでていた:
The identity of the mysterious monsters is the grudge of Nadravian... And the grudge that was overflowing in the Dark Realm has been sealed
thanks to everyone's efforts.

323075.「ナドラガンドの民を代表して\n ご協力に 感謝いたします。:
On behalf of the people of Nadragand, I thank
you for your cooperation.

323076.「闇の領界での封印が 影響したのか\n その他の領界でも 敵の勢力が\n 弱まり:
There are reports that the sealing of the Dark
Realm has had an impact, and that enemy forces
are weakening in other realms as well.

323077.「それは 朗報と言えるが……\n ナドラガの器の件を どうにかせねばならん。:
I would say that is good news but we have to
do something about the Nadraga vessels.

323078.「トビアスさまに ご報告です！！\n 各領界から 謎の魔物たちが 一斉に\n 撤:
I have an announcement to make to Mr. Tobias! We have received reports that the mysterious monsters have begun to retreat from the
various realms!

323080.「それが その……。\n 報告を総合すると 謎の魔物は すべて\n ある場所へ向:
That's the thing... Based on the totality of
the reports, we believe that the mysterious
MONSTER is all headed to a certain place.

323081.「神墟ナドラグラムです！\n これは 撤退というより 何か 目的があって\n 向:
Nadragram Shrine! This is not a retreat, but
rather something that has a purpose...

323082.「ナドラグラムだと！？\n かの地にある 竜神の柩には ルビーが……。:
Nadragram! Ruby is in Dragon God's Coffin in
the land of the Dragon God...

323083.「……いや。狙いは 断罪の剣のようだ。\n すでに 怨念の竜が とりついて\n:
...Nope. The Sword of Atonement seems to be
the target. I can already see the dragon of
resentment attached to it, trying to do evil.

323084.「断罪の剣のところへ 向かうぞ <pc>。:
Let's head over to Sword of Atonement
<pc>.

323085.「我々は 引きつづき 警戒を続けましょう。\n 神墟ナドラグラムのこと どうか\:
We will continue to be vigilant, and we ask
for your continued support of Nadragram
Shrine...

323086.「あなたがたのご武運を 祈っております。:
I wish you all the best of luck in your
endeavors.

323088.「どこに行こうと 追いかけてくる……。\n まったく うっとうしい 坊やですね。:
Wherever I go, he chases me... What an
annoying little boy.

323089.「ラキは 速い。\n おまえじゃ 逃げられない！: Lycae are fast. You can't escape!

323090.「わたくしめには 果たすべき任があるのです。\n これ以上 邪魔をしないでいただ:
I have a duty to fulfill. I ask you not to
interfere any further!

323091.「おお…… 我が主よ…………。\n お手をわずらわせて 申し訳ありません。: Oh my Lord... I apologize for troubling you.

323092.「なんだ あれは……。\n まったく 本性が見通せぬ。:
What was that? I can't see its true nature at
all.

323096.「ナドラガ神の器を消した わたくしめの\n 創失の呪いを はじきますか。\n 腐:
Shall I shoot the curse of my unmaking that
erased Nadraga's vessels? Even if it is
rotten, it is indeed a divine instrument.

323097.「ならば 内より 崩す……。: Then, we will collapse it from within...

323098.「おおっ 竜族の怨念を利用して\n 断罪の剣の内なる世界へと 道を開くとは。\n:
Oh, to use Nadravian resentment to open the
way to the inner world of the Sword of
Atonement. As expected of my master!

323099.「さしもの 神器といえども\n 内なる世界から その急所を攻めれば\n 容易に:
Even a sacred object can be easily destroyed
by attacking its vital point from the inner
world.

323100.「邪魔をしたいのならば ご自由に どうぞ。\n もちろん 命の保証は いたしませ:
If you want to interfere, be my guest. Of
course, I can't guarantee your life.

323102.「おのれ……。\n 断罪の剣を失うわけには いかん。\n 後を追うぞ <pc>よ:
We cannot afford to lose the Sword of
Atonement. I will follow you, <pc>!

323103.「今のラキは 足手まとい……置いていって。\n 大丈夫。自分の身は 自分で守れる:
Now Lycae is slowing me down... leave me. It's
okay. I can take care of myself.

323104.「やはり 追ってきましたね。\n となれば おもてなしをしなくては。:
They are after us, after all. Then we have to
do without Heads.

323105.「彼らと 遊んであげてください。\n それでは ごきげんよう。: Play with them. Then how do you do.

323106.「時間稼ぎとは こざかしい。: Stalling for time is a joke.

323107.「あやつらは 奥へ 向かったようだ。\n 急ぎ 後を追うぞ！:
Looks like they're heading for the back. Let's
hurry and follow them!

323109.「我が息子 グランゼニスよ。\n 母から そなたに 授けたいものがあります。:
My son, Gran Zenith. I have something to give
you from my mother.

323111.「神器のひとつである この剣を\n そなたに 授けましょう。:
I bestow upon you this sword, one of the
sacred weapons.

323113.「皆の神器と 同じではありません。\n この剣は 神器の中でも 罪を断つという\:
It is not the same as everyone's sacred artifact. This sword is one of the sacred weapons with the special ability to cut off
sin.

323114.「グランゼニスよ。\n そなたは いずれ とこしえのゆりかごの\n 未来を 継ぐ:
O Gran Zenith. You will eventually become the
heir to the future of the Eternal Cradle.

323115.「そのとき そなたは 多くの罪に向き合い\n 断ち切っていくことに なるでしょう:
At that time, you will face and cut through
many sins.

323116.「勇気をもって 罪に向き合いなさい。\n そなたならば この剣のチカラを借りて\:
Face your sins with courage. You can do it
with the power of this sword.

323120.<center>そんなに 落ち込まないでよ。\nグランゼニスには がんばってもら:
Don't be so downhearted, Gran Zenith needs to
keep up the good work.

323121.<center>私たちは 身体を失っちゃったけど\nその意思は まだ ここに あ:
We may have lost our bodies, but our will is
still here. I think it's too early to give up.

323122.<center>……同意する。\n我らのチカラ おまえに託そう。\n一度 敗れた:
I agree. Our strength is in you. We are not
afraid, even if we were defeated once.

323123.<center>たとえ 我らの意思が\nそれで消えようとも 悔いは ありません。:
Even if our will is extinguished by it, we
have no regrets. Please protect the future of
my children.

323124.<center>我らが末弟 グランゼニスよ！\nさあ 立ち上がるのだ。\nそして:
Our youngest brother, Gran Zenith! Rise up
now! And stop the folly of my eldest brother
Nadraga!

323130.<center>アァァアァァアァ……おのれ……。\n我は この世のすべてを 支配:
Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa... I am
the one who controls everything in this world!

323131.<center>ゆるさぬ…… ゆるさぬぞォ。\nグランゼニィィィィスッ！！:
I won't let you... I won't let you... Granzeni
iiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii
iiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii!

323133.「あれは 断罪の剣の チカラの核とも\n 言うべきものだ。もし 破壊されたならば:
It is the core of the Sword of Atonement's
power. If it were destroyed, the sword itself
would be lost.

323134.「邪魔をするか。\n ならば 斬り伏せるのみ。:
Or you'll get in the way. Then we shall cut
them down.

323135.「ふむ。神の化身を相手にしては\n こちらの分が 悪いと言えましょう。:
Hmmm. It can be said that our odds are not
good against the incarnation of God.

323136.「しかしながら 我が主の前で\n ふたたび 醜態をさらすわけには\n いかないの:
However, I cannot be disfigured again in front
of my Lord!

323137.「これが執行獣と呼ばれる わたくしの本来の姿。\n もちろん 見た目だけでないこ:
This is the true form of what we call an Executioner. Of course, I don't have to tell you that there is more to me than meets the
eye.

323139.「神の器をも消し去った 創失の呪い……。\n たとえ 種族神でも 人の身に宿った:
The curse of unmaking that has obliterated even the vessels of God... Even if you are a god of races, don't think that you will get
away with it for free!

323140.「おまえが あの呪いの根源か。\n 必ずや 討ち倒し\n ナドラガの器を 取りも:
You are the root of that curse. I will surely
defeat you and restore the vessel of Nadraga!

323141.「さあ……。ここから 消え去りなさい！: Come on... Go away from here!

323143.「……ぐうう。そんなバカな。\n わたくしめが このような敗北を……。:
...Ugh. That's absurd. I have suffered such a
defeat...

323144.「我が主…… 申し訳ありません。\n どうか わたくしめを あなたの御許に……。:
My Lord... I am sorry. Please let me be with
you...

323147.「剣の核を壊すのを あきらめたのか？\n あやつに 何が 起こったのだ……。:
Did you give up on destroying the sword's
core? What happened to him?

323149.「私ひとりでは 防ぎきれなかっただろう。\n おまえのはたらきに 感謝するぞ。:
I could not have prevented this on my own.
Thank you for what you've done.

323150.「ここは あやつらが\n 無理やり こじ開けた場所だ。\n 時間の流れが 不安定:
This is the place they forced us to pry open.
I feel the flow of time has become unstable.

323151.「長く とどまることは 得策ではない。\n すみやかに 外に出るべきだろう。\n:
It is not a good idea to stay too long. We
should check on Nadraga's vessels.

323153.「エッちゃんが 帰ってきたのに\n いつまで待っても ふたりが 出てこないから\:
I was worried when Estie came home and they
didn't come out no matter how long I waited!

323154.「私が消えた後 どうなっていたのか\n ポルテさんたちから くわしく 聞きました:
I would like to thank Porte and others for telling me more about what happened after I disappeared, and thank you for saving me from
unmaking.

323155.「どうやら 時間の流れに ゆがみが生じ\n 何日か 経過してしまったようだな。:
It appears that a distortion in the flow of
time has occurred and a few days have passed.

323156.「ポルテよ。もう 動いても よいのか？: Porte. Are you sure you're ready to move?

323157.「うん まごゼニスさまっ。\n 目が覚めてから だいぶ 経ったし\n もう すっ:
Yes, Mr. Magozenis. It's been a long time
since I woke up, and I'm completely fine!

323158.「ラキも 平気！\n あの程度のキズ なめとけば 治る！:
Lycae are fine! A scratch like that can be
cured if you just tame it!

323159.「よし。まずは 皆が無事で 安心したぞ。\n 神の器も 戻ってきたとなれば\n:
Okay. First of all, I'm relieved that everyone is safe. Now that the vessel of God has returned, I can aim for the resurrection of my
body.

323160.「その件ですが ナドラガ神の意思を私に宿す\n 降臨の儀式の準備は トビアスの尽:
As for that matter, the preparations for the descent ceremony to carry out Nadraga's will in me have already been completed thanks to
Tobias' efforts.

323161.「私が 創失の呪いを受けたせいで\n 無駄な時間を 使わせてしまいました。\n:
I have wasted your time because of my curse of
unmaking. It would be better to hurry things
along.

323162.「わかった。すぐに 始めてくれ。\n 断罪の剣の破片を返してくれるよう\n 私が:
Okay, you start right away. Start right away,
and I'll convince Nadraga to return the pieces
of the Sword of Atonement.

323163.「それでは 降臨の儀式を始めましょう。\n すべての領界に向けて 合図を送ります:
Let us begin the ritual of the descent. We
will send a signal to all the realms!

323164.エステラに ナドラガ神の意思を降ろすべく\n降臨の儀式が 開始された。:
The descent ritual was initiated to bring down
the will of Nadraga to Estella.

323165.各領界の ナドラガ神のほこらに派遣された\nナドラガンド協団の神官たちが\n駆け:
Say a Prayer with the divine beasts that the priests of the Nadragand Kyoudan, dispatched to the Nadraga Shrine in each realm, rushed to
the shrine...

323166.各領界で 捧げられた祈りが\nナドラガ神の意思を 呼び覚ましていく……。:
Prayers offered in each realm awaken the will
of Nadraga...

323169.「やはり 兄上なのだな。\n 久方ぶり……と言って いいものか。:
It's your brother after all. It's been a long
time...is that right to say?

323173.「そうだ。母上より授かった 断罪の剣に\n 神器としてのチカラを 取りもどしたい:
Yes, I want to restore the power as a divine weapon to the Sword of Atonement given to me by Mother. I want to restore the power of the
Sword of Atonement, which was given to me by my mother, as a divine weapon.

323175.「この世界は 創失の呪いによって\n むしばまれつつある。:
This world is being devoured by the curse of
unmaking.

323176.「アストルティアを 守るためならば\n たとえ 憎き末弟を 利することになろうと:
To protect Astoltia, even if it means taking
advantage of my youngest brother, who I hate,
you will help me.

323178.「兄上は 変わっていない。\n あなたの冗談は 昔から 下手だった。:
You haven't changed. Your jokes have always
been bad.

323181.「断罪の剣……。\n よくぞ 我がもとに 戻った。: Sword of Atonement... You have returned to me.

323184.「……ううっ 私は……。\n 儀式は どうなって…………？: Ugh, I... What happened to the ritual...?

323186.「どうやら グランゼニス様は\n 断罪の剣を 入手できたようですね。:
It seems that Gran Zenith has obtained the
Sword of Atonement.

323187.「グランゼニス様の御身は 神々の間にあります。\n 光の神殿に 新たに設置した旅:
Gran Zenith is in the Room of Revival, could
you please use the new teleportal in the
Temple of Light to get to the Room of Revival?

323188.「よし。いよいよだな。\n 皆で 光の神殿へ向かうぞ！:
All right. This is it. Let's all head for the
Temple of Light!

323190.「私は 降臨の儀式の結果を\n トビアスに 報告しなければなりませんので\n こ:
I have to report to Tobias on the results of
the descent ceremony, so if you will excuse me
now. Take care on your way.

323191.「お待ちしていました。\n 皆さん ご無事なようで 何よりです。:
We have been waiting for you. I am glad to
hear that everyone is safe.

323192.「ご覧ください。こちらが\n グランゼニス様の御身になります。:
Please take a look. This is Gran Zenith's
body.

323193.「この黒き姿は 我が罪そのものだ。\n 大義のためとはいえ 実の兄を\n この手:
This black figure is my sin itself. I killed
my own brother with my own hands, even if it
was for a good cause.

323194.「だが 兄と通じ合えた今ならば\n この断罪の剣で 我が罪を斬りはらえるはずだ。:
But now that I have communicated with my
brother, I can use this Sword of Atonement to
cut down my sins.

323196.「勇気をもって 今ここに 我が罪を断つ！: With courage, I hereby renounce my sins!

323197.「ありがとうございます グランゼニスさま。\n もう 大丈夫です。: Thank you very much Gran Zenith. I'm fine now.

323198.「<pc> 心配しないで。\n グランゼニスさまに 身体を貸している間も\n 私:
<pc> Don't worry, I was conscious
while I was lending my body to Gran Zenith.

323199.「何があったのか 全部 知っているわ。\n あなたの活躍だって ちゃんと 見てた: I know what happened. I even saw what you did!

323202.「お役に立てたなら 光栄です。: I would be honored if I could be of service.

323203.「おや グランゼニス様。\n 昔の話し方に 戻されるのですか？\n そのまま い:
Oh, Mr. Gran Zenith. Are you going back to
your old way of speaking? I thought you were
going to continue with your stern manner.

323206.「ゼニアスには 新たな主神が必要。\n それが あなただ。\n ラキは やっと:
Zeniath needs a new master god, and it's you.
Lycae has finally found it!

323207.「あとは 王笏と王冠が そろえばいい！:
All that's left is to get the scepter and
crown in order!

323208.「王笏のほうは ネーしゃまが 持ってるよね。\n 王冠も 探しだすって言ってたけ:
Zenny has the scepter, right? He said he would
find the crown, but I wonder if he's found it
yet.

323209.「ねえねえ まごゼニスさま。\n ネーしゃま……じゃなくて\n ゼネシアさまに:
Hey, hey, hey, Mr. Magozenith, let's go see
Zenny...not Zenethia!

323217.「……はやっ！\n 思ってたんだけど まごゼニスさまって\n すごい せっかちさ:
I thought so...huh! I was just thinking,
Magozenis-sama is very impatient...

323218.「それは 仕方ありません。\n あの方は ずっと 見ていることしか\n できなか:
That can't be helped. He could only watch the
whole time.

323219.「そうですよね……。\n さっきまでの私も 手を伸ばしても届かない……\n そん:
That's right... Until a moment ago, I too was
feeling that frustration of not being able to
reach out even if I reached out.

323220.「後を追うことも 難しいでしょう。\n やるべきことを果たして 帰ってくるまでは:
It will be difficult to follow him. It seems
that all we can do is sit back and wait until
he comes back after doing what he has to do.

323221.「忘れぬうちに グランゼニス様から\n 託されていた報酬を あなたに 渡しましょ:
Before I forget, I will give you the reward
that Gran Zenith entrusted to me. Please
accept this.

323222.「ああ そうです。\n 役目は終わったと 思いますので\n 白き導き手は 私に:
Oh, yes. I think I've done my job, so can I
have the Handy Horse back?

323223.<pc>は シオンに\n白き導き手を 返した。:
<pc> returned a Handy Horse to
Shion.

323224.「それでは グランゼドーラ城に\n 戻らせていただきますよ。\n 賢者ルシェンダ:
I will now return to Gran Zedora Castle and
report to Sage Lushenda.

323225.「<pc>。\n 私も シオンさまと 城へ帰るわね。\n ポルテとラキも 本当に:
<pc>. I'm going back to the castle
with Shion, and Porte and Lycae, thank you so
much for your hard work!

323228.「ラキ どうしたの？\n おなかも空いちゃったし あたしたちも\n エテーネの村:
Lycae, what's wrong? I'm hungry. Let's go back
to Ethene Village.

323252.「ふん。いかにも 我は ナドラガなり。\n 我には あの戦いは 昨日のことのよう:
Hmm. Indeed, I am Nadraga. I can remember that
battle like it was yesterday. My brother Gran
Zenith.

323253.「我も 本来の身体ではないが\n 貴様も似たような有り様に なっているな。\n:
I am not in my original body, but I see that
you are in a similar state. It is quite an
interesting experience, isn't it?

323254.「念入りに 封印までしておきながら\n 我が意思を呼び覚ました目的は……\n 断:
I have carefully sealed it, and yet you have
awakened my will with a piece of the Sword of
Atonement, have you not?

323255.「ほう……。\n この我が 素直に返すと 思うてか？:
Well... You think I'm going to give it back to
you?

323256.「……冗談だ。\n ずいぶんと 神らしいクチを\n 利くようになったではないか。:
I'm kidding. You've come a long way in your
god-like mouth.

323257.「ははははっ！\n そうか。我は 冗談が下手くそか。\n 無駄かもしれんが 覚え:
Ha ha ha! I see. I'm not very good at jokes,
am I? It may be futile, but I'll keep it in
mind.

323258.「ふむ……。儀式の効力が 薄れてきたか。\n ならば 急がねばなるまい。:
Hmmm... The ritual's effectiveness is fading.
Then we must hurry.

323259.「今や 全きチカラを振るえる神は\n 貴様しか 残っておらん。\n 見届けるのだ:
You are the only god left who can wield all
his power. You must see it through. You will
see the end of this world...

323269.「おつかれさまでしたー！\n まごゼニスさまが 戻ってきたら\n あたしたちにも:
Thanks for your hard work! Please let us know
when Mr. Magozenith comes back, Anne!

323270.「やっと 新たな主神を 見つけたのに\n どうして うまくいかない……。:
I've finally found a new master god, but why
isn't it working out...

323271.「今回も おつかれさま <pc>隊長っ！\n あたしたちは 先に エテーネの村に:
Thanks again, Captain <pc>! We're
going back to Ethene Village first. Please
drop by my place later!

325122.「緋石の間につながる道は 崩されましたが\n 手前の結界の間に 新たに 旅の扉を:
The path leading to the Crimsonite is severed,
but a new teleportal in the Barrier Chamber
will lead you there. Please make use of it.

325123.「では 私は これにて。: With that, I shall take my leave.

325124.「また 言うだけ言って 行っちゃった……。\n こっちの話も 聞いてほしいなぁ。:
He said what he wanted to say and just left
again... I wish you'd let us talk, too.

325125.「ラキは はやく\n グランゼニス神を 復活させたい。\n 古き神の遺跡へ行こう:
Lycae wants to revive Gran Zenith as soon
as possible. Let's go to those Historic
Ruins!

325258.飛竜に乗って エテーネの島の上空へ飛び\nそこから 光の神殿に 降り立とう。:
Fly above Ethene Island using your flying
dragon and descend to the Temple of Light.

325780.「ほこらに 急がねばならないが\n 通路が閉ざされてしまっているな。\n 別の道:
We have to hurry to the hokoro, but the
passage is closed. We have to find another
way.

326029.影の谷の通路と同時に いざないの間にある\nナドラガ神のほこら・闇 への旅の扉も:
It seems that the teleportal to Nadraga Dark Shrine in the Hall of Invitation has been blocked at the same time as the passage of the
Vale of Shadow. Let's find another way.

326597.「母上。お呼びにより\n グランゼニス 参上いたしました。:
Dear Mother. I have come to Gran Zenith at
your call.

326598.「母上から 私に？\n それは ありがたいことですが\n いったい 何を？:
From your mother to me? Well, that's very kind
of you, but what on earth are you doing?

326599.「おお。兄上や 姉上たちも持つ神器を\n ついに 私にも 授けていただけるとは\:
Oh. It is a great honor for me to finally be
bestowed with the sacred artifact that my
elder brothers and sisters have.

326600.「……わかりました。\n 謹んで お受けいたします 母上。: I understand. I humbly accept, Mother.

326601.「罪を断つ……か。\n では この剣を断罪の剣と 名付けよう！:
To cut off sins... Then let's name this sword
"Sword of Atonement"!

326657.「私では 兄を……。\n ナドラガを止めることは できないのか……。:
I can't stop my brother...I can't stop
Nadraga...I can't stop Nadraga...I can't stop
Nadraga...I can't stop Nadraga.

326658.「そうだ……。\n 母上より授かった この剣にかけて\n 私は ナドラガの罪を断:
Yes... With this sword given to me by my
mother, I must cut off the sins of Nadraga.

326659.「我が兄よ。そして姉よ。\n 私に 最後のチカラを与えたまえっ！:
My brother. And my sister. Give me the last of
your strength!

326661.「今こそ あなたの罪を断つ！\n 兄姉たちよ 私にチカラをっっっ！！:
Now is the time to cut off your sins! Brothers
and sisters, give me strength!

326663.「どうして わかってくれないのだ……。\n 兄……上…………。: Why don't you understand me... Brother....

326664.「改めて 名乗っておくべきだね。\n 私は 女神ルティアナの末子にして\n 人間:
Once again, I should probably state my name. I
am Gran Zenith, the youngest child of Goddess
Lutiana and God of HUMANS.

326665.「今代の勇者たちよ。\n あなたたちの これまでのはたらきには\n おおいに 感:
Heroes of this generation. I am very grateful
for all the work you have done so far.

326666.「いや 復活したと思ったら 勇者姫の\n 可憐な姿だったからね。せめて 神らしく:
No, I thought I was back, but it was in dainty form in the Hero's Room. I was behaving so materialistically that I at least looked
godly.

326667.「もはや その必要もないよ。\n さて これからのことだけど……: No longer necessary. Now, about the future...

326669.「……私が ゼニアスの主神となることを\n 期待されているのは 重々 承知してい:
...I am well aware that I am expected to be
the Lord God of Zeniath. But I am the God of
Astoltia.

326670.「執行者などと うそぶく連中が\n 創失の呪いを この地に振りまこうとするなら\:
If those who lie about being enforcers want to
spread the curse of unmaking in the land, it
must be stopped.

326671.「ゼニアスの主神となる話は\n 全てが 解決してからにしてくれ。:
Talk about Zeniath being the main deity until
all this is resolved.

326672.「……おお そうだ。\n ゴダの後継者にも 会っておく必要があるね。: Oh, yes. We need to meet Goda's successor.

326673.「時間が 惜しい。\n すぐに 行動に移すとしよう。\n では さらばだ！:
Time is of the essence. Let's move on
immediately. Well then, goodbye!

328858.「……きれーい。\n この緋石から チカラをもらえば\n いいんだよね？:
It's so pretty...
We're supposed to gather energy from
it, right?

328860.偽りのリャナ荒涼地帯から ソーラリア峡谷に入り\n古き神の遺跡の奥にある 緋石の:
Enter Solaria Canyon from the false Lyana
Desolate Area and head to the deepest part
of the Historic Ruins to meet with Shion.

328861.「その剣でしたら 隔離された竜族の世界……。\n 神墟ナドラグラムの大地に 残さ:
The sword yet remains in the isolated world of
the Nadravians...within the Nadragram Shrine.

328862.炎の領界 聖都エジャルナから行ける\nいざないの間の旅の扉で 神墟ナドラグラムに:
Head to Nadragram Shine via teleportal in the Hall of Invitation, which is accessible from Ejarna in the Fire Realm. Once there, go
and examine the Sword of Atonement.

328863.「神の器である おまえならば\n ナドラガの意思を その身に宿らせることが\n:
As a divine vessel, surely you can carry
Nadraga's will inside your body?

328864.「その子……。具合が 悪そうですね。\n よろしければ 私の部屋を使ってください:
That boy... You don't look well. If you don't
mind, you can use my room.
